Scripts.OnClick: self:GetParent():Hide() if self:GetParent().cancelFunc then if type(self:GetParent().arg) == "table" then self:GetParent().cancelFunc(unpack(self:GetParent().arg)); else self:GetParent().cancelFunc(self:GetParent().arg); end end

self:GetParent():Hide() if self:GetParent().func then if type(self:GetParent().arg) == "table" then self:GetParent().func(unpack(self:GetParent().arg)); else self:GetParent().func(self:GetParent().arg); end end

Scripts.OnShow: _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(self.text); if self.dlg_type == self.DLG_TYPE.YES_NO then _G[self:GetName().."ButtonClose2"]:Hide() _G[self:GetName().."ButtonClose"]:Show() _G[self:GetName().."ButtonOK"]:Show() _G[self:GetName().."Edit"]:Hide() elseif self.dlg_type == self.DLG_TYPE.OK then _G[self:GetName().."ButtonClose"]:Hide() _G[self:GetName().."ButtonOK"]:Hide() _G[self:GetName().."ButtonClose2"]:Show() _G[self:GetName().."Edit"]:Hide() elseif self.dlg_type == self.DLG_TYPE.EDIT then _G[self:GetName().."Edit"]:Show() _G[self:GetName().."ButtonClose2"]:Hide() _G[self:GetName().."ButtonClose"]:Show() _G[self:GetName().."ButtonOK"]:Show() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not self:GetParent():IsMouseOver() then self:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if not self.isAddBtn then self.ConfigBtn:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not self.ConfigBtn:IsMouseOver() then self.ConfigBtn:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if not self.always_show_list then local list= _G[self:GetName().."List"] list:SetShown(not list:IsShown()) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
self.always_show_list = true self.Text:Hide()
self.List:Show() self.List:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self, "TOPLEFT", 0, 0) self.List.BG:Hide()
self:Disable() local w, h = self:GetSize() local cb_w, h = self.CheckButton:GetSize() self.CheckButton:SetHitRectInsets(0, -(w + cb_w), 0, 0)
